#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>

int main() {
	
	int A[50],T,i,j,B[50],k;
	long long int N;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&N);
		i = 0;
		for(j=0;j<50;j++)
		B[j]=0;
		while(N)
		{
			A[i] = N%2;
			N /=2 ;
			i++;
		
		}
		if(A[0]==1)
		B[0] = 1;
		else
		B[0] = 0;
		for(j=1;j<i;j++)
		{
			B[j] = A[j] + B[j-1];
		}
		k = 0;
		for(j=i-2;j>=0 && k==0;j--)
		{
			if(A[j]){
			if(j+B[j-1]+B[j]<=i-1+B[i-2]){
			k = j;
			}
			}
		}
		if(B[i-1]==1)
		printf("%d\n",i-2);
		else
		printf("%d\n",i-1+B[i-2]-B[k]);
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
